title: Scanning and Identifying Network Nodes
scenario: In this activity, you will use common network tools, such as local commands and the Nmap network mapper, to discover other hosts on the local network. Next, you will conduct a banner grabbing exercise to identify specific services on the hosts. Finally, you will use DNS tools to gather name resolution information.

title: Intercepting and Interpreting Network Traffic with Packet Sniffing Tool
scenario: In this activity you need to use common network tools, and local linux commands to discover host on the network

title: Intercepting and Interpreting Network Traffic with Packet Sniffing Tool
scenario: In this activity you need to use common network tools, and local linux commands to discover host on the network

title: Managing the Life Cycle of a Certificate
scenario: In this activity, you will explore the properties of different kinds of digital certificates and use Windows to request, issue, and revoke certificates.

title: Managing Access Controls in Windows Server
scenario: In this activity, you will explore the use of different kinds of accounts for managing objects in Active Directory and the use of GPO to apply account policies.
